chef_1.title: Executive Chef - Michael Smith
chef_1.description: Chef Michael Smith leads our kitchen with passion and creativity. After honing his skills globally, he brings unique flavors and techniques to every dish at Everlean.

chef_2.title: Sous Chef - Emily Rodriguez
chef_2.description: Chef Emily Rodriguez brings a fresh perspective to our kitchen, infusing her dishes with a vibrant blend of flavors and textures. She has a background in culinary arts and pastry.

chef_3.title: Pastry Chef - David Lee
chef_3.description: Meet our master of sweetness, Pastry Chef David Lee. With a flair for creativity and a passion for perfection, he crafts desserts that are as indulgent as unforgettable.
